reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Very approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent lectures, but the workload is overwhelming. Dr. Thompson could improve on providing timely feedback.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wong is an exceptional teacher. Her lab demonstrations are always exciting and informative.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and hard to follow. Prof. Anderson seems disinterested in student questions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's field trips are the highlight of the course. She's very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson knows his stuff, but his teaching style is a bit too fast-paced for most students.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's analysis of classic texts is insightful. She encourages critical thinking and class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee explains complex theories well. His problem-solving sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's lectures are interesting, but the course structure could use some improvement.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's enthusiasm for art is infectious. His virtual museum tours are a great addition to the course.

reviews.subject: Nutrition
reviews.review: Dr. Murphy provides practical knowledge. Her assignments encourage healthy lifestyle changes.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures are often off-topic. The course content doesn't align well with the syllabus.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Adams makes rocks exciting! Her hands-on approach to learning is refreshing and effective.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. White encourages deep thinking. Discussions in his class are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's research is cutting-edge, but her teaching style can be a bit confusing at times.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson brings real-world experience to the classroom. His case studies are particularly insightful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Watson's lectures are captivating. She presents complex cultural concepts in an accessible way.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Scott is knowledgeable, but his assignments can be unclear. More guidance on projects would be helpful.
